Title: Foundry Town
Writer: Chiyo Hayafune (novel), Shôhei Imamura (screenplay), Kirio Urayama (screenplay)
Actors: Sayuri Yoshinaga, Mitsuo Hamada, Eijirô Tôno, Shôichi Ozawa
Plot: Set in Kawaguchi, just north of Tokyo in the early 60s, this simple story chronicles the lives of poor foundry workers and their families, and one girl's dreams of self-improvement through ...
